001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.FrameDecoder;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PacketSource;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.SegmentPersistencePort;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.capture.SegmentRecord;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.RawFrame;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.TcpSegment;
011import java.util.Objects;
012import java.util.Optional;
013
014/**
015 * Coordinates packet capture by polling a {@link PacketSource}, decoding frames, and persisting
016 * TCP segments.
017 * <p>Not thread-safe; expected to run once per process. Filters pure ACKs to reduce storage
018 * volume.</p>
019 *
020 * @implNote Uses {@link SegmentPersistencePort#persist(SegmentRecord)} for each accepted segment
021 * and increments metrics counters for observability.
022 * @see ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.SegmentPersistencePort
023 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
024 */
025public final class SegmentCaptureUseCase {
026  private final PacketSource packetSource;
027  private final FrameDecoder frameDecoder;
028  private final SegmentPersistencePort persistence;
029  private final MetricsPort metrics;
030
031  /**
032   * Creates a capture use case wiring the required ports.
033   *
034   * @param packetSource stream of raw frames; must be non-null and provide cooperative shutdown
035   * @param frameDecoder decoder that maps frames to TCP segments, optionally empty when not TCP
036   * @param persistence sink for accepted segments
037   * @param metrics metrics sink updated for decode skips and persisted segments
038   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
039   */
040  public SegmentCaptureUseCase(
041      PacketSource packetSource,
042      FrameDecoder frameDecoder,
043      SegmentPersistencePort persistence,
044      MetricsPort metrics) {
045    this.packetSource = Objects.requireNonNull(packetSource, "packetSource");
046    this.frameDecoder = Objects.requireNonNull(frameDecoder, "frameDecoder");
047    this.persistence = Objects.requireNonNull(persistence, "persistence");
048    this.metrics = Objects.requireNonNull(metrics, "metrics");
049  }
050
051  /**
052   * Runs the capture loop until interrupted, persisting each non-empty TCP segment.
053   *
054   * @throws Exception if any port fails during capture, persistence, or cleanup
055   * @implNote Interrupts the current thread when {@link InterruptedException} is observed during poll.
056   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
057   */
058  public void run() throws Exception {
059    boolean started = false;
060    try {
061      packetSource.start();
062      started = true;
063
064      while (!Thread.currentThread().isInterrupted()) {
065        RawFrame frame;
066        try {
067          Optional<RawFrame> maybeFrame = packetSource.poll();
068          if (maybeFrame.isEmpty()) {
069            continue;
070          }
071          frame = maybeFrame.get();
072        } catch (InterruptedException ex) {
073          Thread.currentThread().interrupt();
074          break;
075        }
076
077        Optional<TcpSegment> maybeSegment = frameDecoder.decode(frame);
078        if (maybeSegment.isEmpty()) {
079          metrics.increment("capture.segment.skipped.decode");
080          continue;
081        }
082
083        TcpSegment segment = maybeSegment.get();
084        if (isPureAck(segment)) {
085          metrics.increment("capture.segment.skipped.pureAck");
086          continue;
087        }
088
089        SegmentRecord record = toRecord(frame.timestampMicros(), segment);
090        persistence.persist(record);
091        metrics.increment("capture.segment.persisted");
092      }
093    } finally {
094      try {
095        persistence.flush();
096      } finally {
097        persistence.close();
098        if (started) {
099          packetSource.close();
100        }
101      }
102    }
103  }
104
105  private static boolean isPureAck(TcpSegment segment) {
106    return segment.payload().length == 0
107        && segment.ack()
108        && !segment.syn()
109        && !segment.fin()
110        && !segment.rst()
111        && !segment.psh();
112  }
113
114  private static SegmentRecord toRecord(long timestampMicros, TcpSegment segment) {
115    FiveTuple flow = segment.flow();
116    int flags = 0;
117    if (segment.fin()) flags |= SegmentRecord.FIN;
118    if (segment.syn()) flags |= SegmentRecord.SYN;
119    if (segment.rst()) flags |= SegmentRecord.RST;
120    if (segment.psh()) flags |= SegmentRecord.PSH;
121    if (segment.ack()) flags |= SegmentRecord.ACK;
122
123    return new SegmentRecord(
124        timestampMicros,
125        flow.srcIp(),
126        flow.srcPort(),
127        flow.dstIp(),
128        flow.dstPort(),
129        segment.sequenceNumber(),
130        flags,
131        segment.payload());
132  }
133}
